verses.verse: "Call <S%H7121><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> is there <S%H3426><s%> anyone who will answer <S%H6030><s%> you? And to which <S%H4310><s%> of the holy <S%H6918><s%> ones <S%H6918><s%> will you turn <S%H6437><s%>?
"For vexation <S%H9213><s%> slays <S%H2026><s%> the foolish <S%H191><s%> man, <S%H191><s%> And anger <S%H7068><s%> kills <S%H4191><s%> the simple. <S%H6601><s%>
"I have seen <S%H7200><s%> the foolish <S%H191><s%> taking <S%H8327><s%> root, <S%H8327><s%> And I cursed <S%H6895><s%> his abode <S%H5116><s%> immediately. <S%H6597><s%>

"His sons <S%H1121><s%> are far <S%H7368><s%> from safety, <S%H3468><s%> They are even oppressed <S%H1792><s%> in the gate, <S%H8179><s%> Neither <S%H369><s%> is there <S%H369><s%> a deliverer. <S%H5337><s%>

"His harvest <S%H7105><s%> the hungry <S%H7457><s%> devour, <S%H398><s%> And take <S%H3947><s%> it to a [place of] thorns; <S%H6791><s%> And the schemer <S%H6782><s%> is eager <S%H7602><s%> for their wealth. <S%H2428><s%>
"For affliction <S%H205><s%> does not come <S%H3318><s%> from the dust, <S%H6083><s%> Neither <S%H3808><s%> does trouble <S%H5999><s%> sprout <S%H6779><s%> from the ground, <S%H127><s%>
For man <S%H120><s%> is born <S%H3205><s%> for trouble, <S%H5999><s%> As sparks <S%H1121><s%> <S%H7565><s%> fly <S%H5774><s%> upward. <S%H1361><s%>
"But as for me, I would seek <S%H1875><s%> God, <S%H410><s%> And I would place <S%H7760><s%> my cause <S%H1700><s%> before <S%H413><s%> God; <S%H430><s%>
Who does <S%H6213><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> and unsearchable <S%H369><s%> <S%H2714><s%> things, <S%H2714><s%> Wonders <S%H6381><s%> without <S%H5704><s%> <S%H369><s%> number. <S%H4557><s%>
"He gives <S%H5414><s%> rain <S%H4306><s%> on the earth, <S%H776><s%> And sends <S%H7971><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> on the fields, <S%H2351><s%>
So that He sets <S%H7760><s%> on high <S%H4791><s%> those who are lowly, <S%H8217><s%> And those who mourn <S%H6937><s%> are lifted <S%H7682><s%> to safety. <S%H3468><s%>
"He frustrates <S%H6565><s%> the plotting <S%H4284><s%> of the shrewd, <S%H6175><s%> So that their hands <S%H3027><s%> cannot <S%H3808><s%> attain <S%H6213><s%> success. <S%H8454><s%>
"He captures <S%H3920><s%> the wise <S%H2450><s%> by their own shrewdness <S%H6193><s%> And the advice <S%H6098><s%> of the cunning <S%H6617><s%> is quickly <S%H4116><s%> thwarted. <S%H4116><s%>
"By day <S%H3119><s%> they meet <S%H6298><s%> with darkness, <S%H2822><s%> And grope <S%H4959><s%> at noon <S%H6672><s%> as in the night. <S%H3915><s%>
"But He saves <S%H3467><s%> from the sword <S%H2719><s%> of their mouth, <S%H6310><s%> And the poor <S%H34><s%> from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the mighty. <S%H2389><s%>
"So the helpless <S%H1800><s%> has <S%H1961><s%> hope, <S%H8615><s%> And unrighteousness <S%H9390><s%> must shut <S%H7092><s%> its mouth. <S%H6310><s%>

"Behold, <S%H2009><s%> how happy <S%H835><s%> is the man <S%H582><s%> whom God <S%H433><s%> reproves, <S%H3198><s%> So do not despise <S%H3988><s%> the discipline <S%H4148><s%> of the Almighty. <S%H7706><s%>
"For He inflicts <S%H3510><s%> pain, <S%H3510><s%> and gives <S%H2280><s%> relief; <S%H2280><s%> He wounds, <S%H4272><s%> and His hands <S%H3027><s%> [also] heal. <S%H7495><s%>
"From six <S%H8337><s%> troubles <S%H6869><s%> He will deliver <S%H5337><s%> you, Even in seven <S%H7651><s%> evil <S%H9563><s%> will not touch <S%H5060><s%> you.
"In famine <S%H7458><s%> He will redeem <S%H6299><s%> you from death, <S%H4194><s%> And in war <S%H4421><s%> from the power <S%H3027><s%> of the sword. <S%H2719><s%>

"You will be hidden <S%H2244><s%> from the scourge <S%H7752><s%> of the tongue, <S%H3956><s%> Neither <S%H3808><s%> will you be afraid <S%H3372><s%> of violence <S%H7701><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> it comes. <S%H935><s%>
"You will laugh <S%H7832><s%> at violence <S%H7701><s%> and famine, <S%H3720><s%> Neither <S%H408><s%> will you be afraid <S%H3372><s%> of wild <S%H776><s%> beasts. <S%H9130><s%>
"For you will be in league <S%H1285><s%> with the stones <S%H68><s%> of the field; <S%H7704><s%> And the beasts <S%H9130><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> will be at peace <S%H7999><s%> with you.

"And you will know <S%H3045><s%> that your tent <S%H168><s%> is secure, <S%H7965><s%> For you will visit <S%H6485><s%> your abode <S%H5116><s%> and fear <S%H2398><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> loss. <S%H2398><s%>
"You will know <S%H3045><s%> also that your descendants <S%H2233><s%> will be many, <S%H7227><s%> And your offspring <S%H6631><s%> as the grass <S%H6212><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>
"You will come <S%H935><s%> to the grave <S%H6913><s%> in full <S%H3624><s%> vigor, <S%H3624><s%> Like the stacking <S%H5927><s%> of grain <S%H1430><s%> in its season. <S%H6256><s%>
"Behold <S%H2009><s%> this, <S%H384><s%> we have investigated <S%H2713><s%> it, thus <S%H3651><s%> it is; Hear <S%H8085><s%> it, and know <S%H3045><s%> for yourself."
